con:request.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Products_empty", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Just\nAn\nExample", "reportSql":"select p.id, p.name, p.currency_code, p.min_principal_amount, p.max_principal_amount, p.start_date, p.close_date, SUM(l.principal_amount) as total_principal_amount, SUM(l.principal_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_principal_amount, SUM(l.total_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_amount from m_product_loan p inner join m_loan l on l.product_id = p.id and l.loan_status_id in (99999999) group by p.id", "reportParameters":[] }

con:request.name: Loan Products
con:request.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Products_empty", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Just\nAn\nExample", "reportSql":"select p.id, p.name, p.currency_code, p.min_principal_amount, p.max_principal_amount, p.start_date, p.close_date, SUM(l.principal_amount) as total_principal_amount, SUM(l.principal_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_principal_amount, SUM(l.total_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_amount from m_product_loan p inner join m_loan l on l.product_id = p.id and l.loan_status_id in (99999999) group by p.id", "reportParameters":[] }

con:request.name: ProfitLoss report
con:request.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Profit_Loss_00", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Just\nAn\nExample", "reportSql":"select glcode, name, balance from ( select glcode, name, balance from ( select debits.glcode as 'glcode', debits.name as 'name', (ifnull(credits.creditamount,0)-ifnull(debits.debitamount,0)) as 'balance' from (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'debitamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=2 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (4) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) debits LEFT OUTER JOIN (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'creditamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=1 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (4) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) credits on debits.name=credits.name union select credits.glcode as 'glcode', credits.name as 'name', (ifnull(credits.creditamount,0)-ifnull(debits.debitamount,0)) as 'balance' from (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'debitamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=2 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (4) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) debits RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'creditamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=1 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (4) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) credits on debits.name=credits.name) income UNION select glcode, name, balance from (select debits.glcode as 'glcode', debits.name as 'name', (ifnull(credits.creditamount,0)-ifnull(debits.debitamount,0)) as 'balance' from (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'debitamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=2 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (5) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) debits LEFT OUTER JOIN (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'creditamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=1 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (5) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) credits on debits.name=credits.name union select credits.glcode as 'glcode', credits.name as 'name', (ifnull(credits.creditamount,0)-ifnull(debits.debitamount,0)) as 'balance' from (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'debitamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=2 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (5) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) debits RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select acc_gl_account.gl_code as 'glcode',name,sum(amount) as 'creditamount' from acc_gl_journal_entry,acc_gl_account where acc_gl_account.id = acc_gl_journal_entry.account_id and acc_gl_journal_entry.type_enum=1 and acc_gl_account.classification_enum in (5) and acc_gl_journal_entry.entry_date between '2020-08-01' and '2020-08-31' group by name) credits on debits.name=credits.name) expenses ) profitloss", "reportParameters":[] }

con:request.name: Loans List
con:request.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loans_03", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"List_Loans", "reportSql":"select l.id, l.product_id, c.external_id as customerId, l.submittedon_date as registeredDate, l.expected_maturedon_date as dueDate, l.currency_code as currency, l.principal_amount as loanAmount, l.total_expected_repayment_derived as totalAmount, l.total_outstanding_derived as outstandingAmount, l.total_repayment_derived as totalAmountRepaid, l.loan_status_id as status from m_loan l inner join m_client c on c.id = l.client_id where l.product_id in (\$\{productIdList\}) and l.submittedon_date >= '\$\{startDate\}' and l.submittedon_date <= '\$\{endDate\}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":25,"reportParameterName":"productIdList"}] }

con:request.name: Loans List count
con:request.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loans_Count", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"List_Loans_Count", "reportSql":"select count(1) as count from m_loan l where l.product_id in (\$\{productIdList\}) and l.submittedon_date >= '\$\{startDate\}' and l.submittedon_date <= '\$\{endDate\}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":25,"reportParameterName":"productIdList"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loan Products
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Products_00", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Just\nAn\nExample", "reportSql":"select p.id, p.name, p.currency_code, p.min_principal_amount, p.max_principal_amount, p.start_date, p.close_date, SUM(l.principal_amount) as total_principal_amount, SUM(l.principal_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_principal_amount, SUM(l.total_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_amount from m_product_loan p left join m_loan l on l.product_id = p.id and l.loan_status_id in (300, 303, 304, 700) group by p.id", "reportParameters":[] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loans
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loans", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"List_Loans", "reportSql":"select l.id, l.product_id, c.external_id as customerId, l.submittedon_date as registeredDate, l.expected_maturedon_date as dueDate, l.currency_code as currency, l.principal_amount as loanAmount, l.total_expected_repayment_derived as totalAmount, l.total_outstanding_derived as outstandingAmount, l.total_repayment_derived as totalAmountRepaid, l.loan_status_id as status, a.overdue_since_date_derived IS NOT NULL AS inArrears from m_loan l inner join m_client c on c.id = l.client_id left join m_loan_arrears_aging a on a.loan_id = l.id where l.product_id in ($${productIdList}) and l.submittedon_date >= '$${startDate}' and l.submittedon_date <= '$${endDate}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":25,"reportParameterName":"productIdList"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loans Count
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loans_Count", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Loans_Count", "reportSql":"select count(1) as count from m_loan l where l.product_id in ($${productIdList}) and l.submittedon_date >= '$${startDate}' and l.submittedon_date <= '$${endDate}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":25,"reportParameterName":"productIdList"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report MW Loan Recovery
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName": "lmsLoanRecoveryReport", "reportType": "Table", "reportSubType": "", "reportCategory": "Loan", "useReport": "false", "description": "", "reportSql": "select c.external_id identity, TRIM(LEADING '0' from l.account_no) loanId, l.currency_code currencyCode, l.total_outstanding_derived totalOustanding, a.overdue_since_date_derived endDate, l.total_outstanding_derived totalRequested from m_client c, m_loan l right join m_loan_arrears_aging a on l.account_no = a.loan_id where l.client_id = c.id and l.loan_status_id = 300 and l.product_id in (select to_id from m_entity_to_entity_mapping where rel_id = 1 and from_id = (select id from m_office where external_id = '$${officeId}'))" }

con:restRequest.name: Report MW Loan Updates
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName": "lmsLoanUpdteReport", "reportType": "Table", "reportSubType": "", "reportCategory": "Loan", "useReport": "false", "description": "", "reportSql": "select c.external_id identity, TRIM(LEADING '0' from l.account_no) loanId, sysdate() timestamp, l.currency_code currencyCode, l.total_outstanding_derived totalOustanding, case when l.loan_status_id = 300 and a.total_overdue_derived is not null then 'Overdue' when l.loan_status_id = 300 then 'Active Normal' when l.loan_status_id = 600 then 'Closed Repaid' end loanStatus, ifnull(l.closedon_date, '') closedDate, 'SMS' communication, 0 recovery, '' lastPromise, '' lastBrokenPromise, '' lastKeptPromise from m_client c, m_loan l left join m_loan_arrears_aging a on l.account_no = a.loan_id where l.client_id = c.id and l.loan_status_id in (300, 600) and l.product_id in (select to_id from m_entity_to_entity_mapping where rel_id = 1 and from_id = (select id from m_office where external_id = '$${officeId}' )) and date(ifnull(l.closedon_date, date(sysdate()) - 1)) = date(sysdate()) - 1" }

con:restRequest.name: Report MW Loan Creation
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName": "lmsLoanCreationReport", "reportType": "Table", "reportSubType": "", "reportCategory": "Loan", "useReport": "false", "description": "", "reportSql": "select total_expected_repayment_derived as totalOutstanding, maturedon_date as matureDate, DATE_FORMAT(`E M`.createdDate, \"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s\") as createdDate from m_loan join `External Metadata` `E M` on m_loan.id = `E M`.loan_id where id = '$${loanId}'" }

con:restRequest.name: Report MW Loan Balance & Date
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName": "lmsLoanBalanceDateReport", "reportType": "Table", "reportSubType": "", "reportCategory": "Loan", "useReport": "false", "description": "", "reportSql": "select l.total_outstanding_derived as totalOutstanding, DATE_FORMAT(lt.created_date, \"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s\") as transactionDate from m_loan_transaction lt join m_loan l on lt.loan_id = l.id where lt.id = '$${transactionId}'" }

con:restRequest.name: Report MW Loan Creation External
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName": "lmsLoanCreationExternalReport", "reportType": "Table", "reportSubType": "", "reportCategory": "Loan", "useReport": "false", "description": "", "reportSql": "select total_expected_repayment_derived as totalOutstanding, maturedon_date as matureDate, DATE_FORMAT(`E M`.createdDate, \"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s\") as createdDate, id as loanId, currency_code as currency, loan_status_id as status from m_loan join `External Metadata` `E M` on m_loan.id = `E M`.loan_id where external_id = '$${externalId}'" }

con:restRequest.name: Report MW Loan Recon
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName": "lmsReconReport", "reportType": "Table", "reportSubType": "", "reportCategory": "Loan", "useReport": "false", "description": "", "reportSql": "select pd.receipt_number as MobileMoneyReceiptNumber, DATE_FORMAT(lt.created_date, \"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\") as CompletionTime, te.enum_value as ReasonType, case when lt.transaction_type_enum = 1 then 'C' else 'D' end as EntryType, lt.amount as TransactionAmount, 'C' as OppositePartyType, c.external_id as OppositePartyID from m_loan_transaction lt join m_loan l on lt.loan_id = l.id join m_client c on l.client_id = c.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = l.product_id join m_office mo on mo.id = etm.from_id or mo.id = etm.to_id join r_enum_value te on te.enum_id = lt.transaction_type_enum and te.enum_name = 'loan_transaction_type_enum' left join m_payment_detail pd on lt.payment_detail_id = pd.id where lt.transaction_type_enum in(1, 2, 5) and (lt.created_date between ('$${startDate}') and ('$${endDate}')) and mo.external_id = '$${officeId}'" }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loan Book Summary - Tenant
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loan_Book_Summary_Tenant_Current", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Loan Book Summary (Current Loans)", "reportSql":"select DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%S') as summary_date, office, term, product_id, product_name, currency, COUNT(loan_id) as num_active_loans, SUM(overdue) as num_overdue_loans, SUM(principal_disbursed_derived) as principal_amount, SUM(total_expected_repayment_derived) as total_repayment_amount, SUM(principal_outstanding_derived) as principal_outstanding_amount, SUM(total_outstanding_derived) as total_outstanding_amount from (select o.external_id as office, l.id as loan_id, l.product_id as product_id, pl.name as product_name, pl.currency_code as currency, DATEDIFF(expected_maturedon_date, expected_disbursedon_date) as term, IF(la.overdue_since_date_derived IS NULL, 0, 1) as overdue, principal_disbursed_derived, total_expected_repayment_derived, principal_outstanding_derived, total_outstanding_derived from m_loan l join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = l.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id left join m_loan_arrears_aging la on la.loan_id = l.id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_loan_products' and l.loan_status_id in (300) and etm.rel_id = 1 ) loans group by loans.office, loans.product_id, loans.product_name, loans.currency, loans.term", "reportParameters":[] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loans by Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loans_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"List_Loans", "reportSql":"select l.id, l.product_id, c.external_id as customerId, l.submittedon_date as registeredDate, DATEDIFF(l.expected_maturedon_date, l.expected_disbursedon_date) as term, l.expected_disbursedon_date as disbursedonDate, l.expected_maturedon_date as dueDate, l.currency_code as currency, l.principal_amount as loanAmount, l.total_expected_repayment_derived as totalAmount, l.total_outstanding_derived as outstandingAmount, l.total_repayment_derived as totalAmountRepaid, l.loan_status_id as status, a.overdue_since_date_derived IS NOT NULL AS inArrears from m_loan l inner join m_client c on c.id = l.client_id left join m_loan_arrears_aging a on a.loan_id = l.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = l.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_loan_products' and o.external_id = '$${office}' and l.submittedon_date >= '$${startDate}' and l.submittedon_date <= '$${endDate}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loans Count By Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loans_Count_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Loans_Count", "reportSql":"select count(1) as count from m_loan l join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = l.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_loan_products' and o.external_id = '$${office}' and l.submittedon_date >= '$${startDate}' and l.submittedon_date <= '$${endDate}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loan Details by Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loan_Details_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Loan_Details", "reportSql":"select l.id as id, l.external_id as external_id, l.account_no as accountNumber, l.product_id as loanProductId, pl.name as loanProductName, c.external_id as customerId, DATEDIFF(l.expected_maturedon_date, l.expected_disbursedon_date) as term, em.Interest_Rate as interestRate, em.Tax1_Rate as tax1Rate, em.Tax2_Rate as tax2Rate, em.Tax3_Rate as tax3Rate, em.Strategy as strategy, l.submittedon_date as registeredDate, l.expected_maturedon_date as dueDate, l.currency_code as currency, l.principal_amount as loanAmount, l.total_expected_repayment_derived as totalAmount, l.total_outstanding_derived as outstandingAmount, l.total_repayment_derived as totalAmountRepaid, l.loan_status_id as status, a.overdue_since_date_derived IS NOT NULL AS inArrears from m_loan l inner join m_client c on c.id = l.client_id left join m_loan_arrears_aging a on a.loan_id = l.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = l.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id join `External Metadata` em on em.loan_id = l.id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_loan_products' and l.id = $${loanId} and o.external_id = '$${office}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1004,"loanId":"loanId"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loan Transactions
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loan_Transactions", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Loan_Transactions", "reportSql":"select lt.id as id, DATE_FORMAT(lt.created_date, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%S') as createdDate, lt.transaction_date as transactionDate, lt.transaction_type_enum as transactionType, lt.amount as amount, pl.currency_code as currency from m_loan l inner join m_loan_transaction lt on lt.loan_id = l.id inner join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id where l.id = $${loanId}", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1004,"loanId":"loanId"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Loan Charges
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"LMS_Loan_Charges", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Loan", "useReport":"false", "description":"Loan_Charges", "reportSql":"select lc.id as id, lc.charge_id as chargeType, c.name as chargeTypeName, c.currency_code as currency, lc.amount as amount from m_loan_charge lc inner join m_charge c on c.id = lc.charge_id where lc.loan_id = $${loanId}", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1004,"loanId":"loanId"}] }

con:testStep.name: Report Overdraft Daily Extract by Office

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdraft Daily Extract by Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Extract_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft Extract By Office for date", "reportSql":"select contractId, account_no, status_enum, sub_status_enum, s.overdraft_limit, s.nominal_annual_interest_rate_overdraft, od.startDate, od.dueDate, od.endDate from Overdraft od join m_savings_account s on od.savings_account_id = s.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = s.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product ps on ps.id = s.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and o.external_id = '$${office}' and od.startDate < DATE_ADD('$${extractDate}', INTERVAL 1 DAY) and (od.endDate IS NULL OR od.endDate >= '$${extractDate}')", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"extractDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:testStep.name: Report Overdraft Daily Transaction Extract by Office

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdraft Daily Transaction Extract by Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Trx_Extract_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft Transaction Extract By Office for date", "reportSql":"select tr.transaction_date, c.external_id as externalClientId, sa.account_no as accountNumber, tr.transaction_type_enum as transactionType, CASE WHEN tr.transaction_type_enum in (1,3,6,8) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as isDebit, tr.amount as amount, tr.id as transactionId from m_savings_account sa join m_client c on c.id = sa.client_id join m_savings_account_transaction tr on tr.savings_account_id = sa.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and o.external_id = '$${office}' and tr.is_reversed = 0 and tr.transaction_date = '$${extractDate}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"extractDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:testStep.name: Report Overdraft Daily Value Share by Office

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdraft Daily Value Share by Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Value_Share", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft Value Share By Office for date", "reportSql":"select extractDate, numberOfContractsExtended, numberOfContractsInterestPosted, numberOfContractsPenaltiesCharged, CASE WHEN overdraftTaken IS NOT NULL THEN overdraftTaken ELSE 0 END as overdraftTaken, CASE WHEN fees IS NOT NULL THEN fees ELSE 0 END as fees, CASE WHEN penalties IS NOT NULL THEN penalties ELSE 0 END as penalties, CASE WHEN interest IS NOT NULL THEN interest ELSE 0 END as interest from ( select '$${extractDate}' as extractDate, COUNT(distinct sa.id) as numberOfContractsExtended, SUM(tr.amount) as overdraftTaken from m_savings_account sa join m_savings_account_transaction tr on tr.savings_account_id = sa.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and tr.transaction_type_enum = 2 and tr.is_reversed = 0 and o.external_id = '$${office}' and tr.transaction_date = '$${extractDate}') extensions, ( select COUNT(distinct sa.id) as numberOfContractsInterestPosted, SUM(tr.amount) as interest from m_savings_account sa join m_savings_account_transaction tr on tr.savings_account_id = sa.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and tr.transaction_type_enum = 17 and tr.is_reversed = 0 and o.external_id = '$${office}' and tr.transaction_date = '$${extractDate}') interest, ( select COUNT(distinct sa.id) as numberOfContractsPenaltiesCharged, SUM(tr.amount) as penalties from m_savings_account sa join m_savings_account_transaction tr on tr.savings_account_id = sa.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and tr.transaction_type_enum = 7 and tr.is_reversed = 0 and o.external_id = '$${office}' and tr.transaction_date = '$${extractDate}') penalties, ( select SUM(tr.amount) as fees from m_savings_account sa join m_savings_account_transaction tr on tr.savings_account_id = sa.id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and tr.transaction_type_enum = 4 and tr.is_reversed = 0 and o.external_id = '$${office}' and tr.transaction_date = '$${extractDate}') fees where CURDATE() > extractDate", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"extractDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdraft SMS Notifications
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_SMS_Notifications", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft SMS Notifications By Office for date", "reportSql":"select cl.external_id as externalId, sa.status_enum as status, sa.sub_status_enum as subStatus, sa.account_balance_derived as balance, od.dueDate as dueDate from Overdraft od join m_savings_account sa on sa.id = od.savings_account_id join m_client cl on cl.id = sa.client_id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and sa.status_enum = 300 and o.external_id = '$${office}' and sa.account_balance_derived <> 0 and od.startDate<= CURDATE() and od.endDate IS NULL", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:testStep.name: Report Get Client For Ext ID

con:restRequest.name: Report Get Client For Ext ID
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"GET_CLIENT_EXT", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Get Client for External ID", "reportSql":"select c.id as entityId, c.display_name as entityName, c.external_id as entityExternalId, c.account_no as entityAccountNo, c.office_id as parentId, o.name as parentName, c.status_enum as entityStatusEnum from m_client c join m_office o on o.id = c.office_id where c.external_id = '$${extId}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"extId"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdraft Count By Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Overdraft_Count_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft_Count", "reportSql":"select count(sa.id) as recordCount from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account sa on sa.id = od.savings_account_id and ((od.endDate IS NOT NULL and od.endDate >= $${startDate}) or (od.endDate IS NULL and od.dueDate >= $${startDate})) and od.startDate <= $${endDate} inner join m_client c on c.id = sa.client_id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and o.external_id = '$${office}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdrafts By Office
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Overdrafts_By_Office", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft_List", "reportSql":"select od.contractId as contractId, sa.id, sa.product_id, c.external_id as customerId, od.startDate as registeredDate, DATEDIFF(od.dueDate, od.startDate) as term, od.startDate as disbursedonDate, od.dueDate as dueDate, od.endDate as endDate, sa.currency_code as currency, CASE WHEN od.endDate IS NULL THEN sa.account_balance_derived ELSE 0 END as account_balance_derived, sa.status_enum as status, sa.sub_status_enum as subStatus from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account sa on sa.id = od.savings_account_id and ((od.endDate IS NOT NULL and od.endDate >= $${startDate}) or (od.endDate IS NULL and od.dueDate >= $${startDate})) and od.startDate <= $${endDate} inner join m_client c on c.id = sa.client_id join m_entity_to_entity_mapping etm on etm.to_id = sa.product_id join m_entity_relation er on er.id = etm.rel_id join m_office o on o.id = etm.from_id join m_savings_product sp on sp.id = sa.product_id where er.code_name = 'office_access_to_savings_products' and o.external_id = '$${office}' order by registeredDate LIMIT $${queryLimit} OFFSET $${queryOffset}", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"startDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":2,"reportParameterName":"endDate"},{"id":"","parameterId":1013,"reportParameterName":"queryLimit"},{"id":"","parameterId":1014,"reportParameterName":"queryOffset"},{"id":"","parameterId":5,"reportParameterName":"office"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdrafts By Client Account
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Overdrafts_By_Acc", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft_List_By_Client_Account", "reportSql":"select od.contractId as contractId, sa.id, sa.product_id, c.external_id as customerId, od.startDate as registeredDate, DATEDIFF(od.dueDate, od.startDate) as term, od.startDate as disbursedonDate, od.dueDate as dueDate, od.endDate as endDate, sa.currency_code as currency, CASE WHEN od.endDate IS NULL THEN sa.account_balance_derived ELSE 0 END as account_balance_derived, sa.status_enum as status, sa.sub_status_enum as subStatus from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account sa on sa.id = od.savings_account_id inner join m_client c on c.id = sa.client_id where sa.id = $${accountId} order by registeredDate LIMIT $${queryLimit} OFFSET $${queryOffset}", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"accountId"},{"id":"","parameterId":1013,"reportParameterName":"queryLimit"},{"id":"","parameterId":1014,"reportParameterName":"queryOffset"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdrafts Contract Details
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Contract_Details", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft_Contract_Details", "reportSql":"select sa.id as accountId, c.external_id as customerId, sa.overdraft_limit as overdraftLimit, sa.status_enum as status, sa.sub_status_enum as subStatus, sa.currency_code as currency, od.contractId as contractId, od.startDate as startDate, od.dueDate as dueDate, od.endDate as endDate, CASE WHEN od.endDate IS NULL THEN sa.account_balance_derived ELSE 0 END as accountBalance, sa.last_interest_calculation_date as lastInterestCalculationDate, (select SUM(amount) from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account_transaction sat on sat.savings_account_id = od.savings_account_id and od.startDate <= sat.created_date and (od.endDate IS NULL OR od.endDate >= sat.created_date) where od.contractId = '$${contractId}' and transaction_type_enum = 4 and is_reversed = 0) as totalFees, ( select SUM(amount) from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account_transaction sat on sat.savings_account_id = od.savings_account_id and od.startDate <= sat.created_date and (od.endDate IS NULL OR od.endDate >= sat.created_date) where od.contractId = '$${contractId}' and transaction_type_enum = 17 and is_reversed = 0) as totalInterest from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account sa on sa.id = od.savings_account_id inner join m_client c on c.id = sa.client_id where od.contractId = '$${contractId}'", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"contractId"}] }

con:restRequest.name: Report Overdrafts Contract Transactions
con:restRequest.con:request: { "reportName":"OD_Contract_Transactions", "reportType":"Table", "reportSubType":"", "reportCategory":"Overdraft", "useReport":"false", "description":"Overdraft_Contract_Transactions", "reportSql":"select sat.created_date, sat.transaction_type_enum, sat.amount from Overdraft od inner join m_savings_account_transaction sat on sat.savings_account_id = od.savings_account_id and od.startDate <= sat.created_date and (od.endDate IS NULL OR od.endDate >= sat.created_date) where od.contractId = '$${contractId}' and is_reversed = 0", "reportParameters":[{"id":"","parameterId":1,"reportParameterName":"contractId"}] }

con:testStep.name: Map Office to Savings OD Product

con:restRequest.name: Map Office to Savings OD Product
Create Loan Overdraft Product
con:restRequest.con:request: { "currencyCode":"${#Project#currency}", "includeInBorrowerCycle":"false", "useBorrowerCycle":false, "digitsAfterDecimal":"2", "inMultiplesOf":"1", "repaymentFrequencyType":0, "interestRateFrequencyType":3, "amortizationType":1,"interestType":0, "interestCalculationPeriodType":0, "transactionProcessingStrategyId":1, "principalVariationsForBorrowerCycle":[], "interestRateVariationsForBorrowerCycle":[], "numberOfRepaymentVariationsForBorrowerCycle":[], "multiDisburseLoan":true, "accountingRule":"2", "daysInYearType":1, "daysInMonthType":1, "isInterestRecalculationEnabled":true, "interestRecalculationCompoundingMethod":0, "rescheduleStrategyMethod":3, "preClosureInterestCalculationStrategy":1, "isLinkedToFloatingInterestRates":false, "allowVariableInstallments":false, "name":"${#Project#bankName} Overdraft", "shortName":"${#Project#loanOverdraftProductShortName}", "description":"${#Project#bankName} Overdraft", "fundId":1, "installmentAmountInMultiplesOf":"1", "principal":"100", "minPrincipal":"1", "maxPrincipal":"100000", "minNumberOfRepayments":"1", "numberOfRepayments":"1", "maxNumberOfRepayments":"10", "minInterestRatePerPeriod":"0", "interestRatePerPeriod":"12", "maxInterestRatePerPeriod":"35", "repaymentEvery":"1", "minimumDaysBetweenDisbursalAndFirstRepayment":"1", "graceOnPrincipalPayment":"0", "graceOnInterestPayment":"0", "graceOnInterestCharged":"0", "inArrearsTolerance":"0", "graceOnArrearsAgeing":"0", "overdueDaysForNPA":"30", "accountMovesOutOfNPAOnlyOnArrearsCompletion":true, "principalThresholdForLastInstallment":"100", "recalculationRestFrequencyType":2, "recalculationRestFrequencyInterval":"1", "isArrearsBasedOnOriginalSchedule":true, "maxTrancheCount":"365", "outstandingLoanBalance":"100000", "fundSourceAccountId":${#Project#glaccountAssetId}, "transfersInSuspenseAccountId":${#Project#glaccountAssetId}, "loanPortfolioAccountId":${#Project#glaccountAssetId}, "incomeFromFeeAccountId":${#Project#glaccountIncomeFeeId}, "incomeFromRecoveryAccountId":${#Project#glaccountIncomeId}, "incomeFromPenaltyAccountId":${#Project#glaccountIncomePenaltyId}, "interestOnLoanAccountId":${#Project#glaccountIncomeInterestId}, "writeOffAccountId":${#Project#glaccountExpenseId}, "overpaymentLiabilityAccountId":${#Project#glaccountLiabilityId}, "paymentChannelToFundSourceMappings":[], "feeToIncomeAccountMappings":[], "penaltyToIncomeAccountMappings":[], "charges":[{"id":${#Project#chargeLoanOverdraftWithdrawalFeeId}}], "allowAttributeOverrides":{ "amortizationType":true, "interestType":true, "transactionProcessingStrategyId":true, "interestCalculationPeriodType":true, "inArrearsTolerance":true, "repaymentEvery":true, "graceOnPrincipalAndInterestPayment":true, "graceOnArrearsAgeing":true}, "locale":"en", "dateFormat":"dd MMMM yyyy", "startDate":"17 March 2021", "closeDate":"17 March 2121", "allowPartialPeriodInterestCalcualtion":false }

con:testStep.name: Map Office to Loan Overdraft Product

con:restRequest.name: Map Office to Loan Overdraft Product
